alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 5:44AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pine, southwestern St. Louis and Carlton Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 543 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Floodwood, to near Cromwell, to near Kettle River, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cloquet, Hermantown, Scanlon, Carlton, Mahtowa, Barnum, Floodwood, Cotton, Willow River, Wrenshall, Cromwell, Holyoke, Kettle River, Thomson, Brookston, Meadowlands, Pike Lake Near Duluth, Nemadji, Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, and Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Pine
